level.heading: AMENDMENT OF FOREIGN REGISTRATION STATEMENT (ยง 17-718)

level.text: In addition to the requirements of Chapter 1 (General Provisions) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-101.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)), the foreign entity amending its foreign registration statement shall:
Specify in detail how the amended foreign registration statement differs from the existing foreign registration statement;
Submit a certified copy of the filing effectuating the amendment; and
The certified copy must be dated within the most recent ninety (90) days by the Secretary of State or authorized officer of the jurisdiction of formation.
